<div class="box" style="
width: {{{Width (Percent)|100%}}};
height: {{{Height}}};
float: {{{Float}}};
overflow: hidden;
margin-bottom: {{#if:{{{8|}}}|0|20px}};
display: inline-block;
border: 1px solid #d9d9d9;
border-radius: 1px 1x 0 0;
background-color: #fff;
{{#if:{{{8|}}}|position: fixed;
{{{8}}}<!--if 8th parameter, add it to fixed positioning-->}}
"><div class="box-header" style="
text-align: center;
font-size: 1.5em;
display: block;
clear: both;
margin: 0;
border-top: 1px solid #fff;
border-bottom: 1px solid #d9d9d9;
border-radius: 1px 1px 0 0;
background-color: #f2f2f2;
padding: 8px 20px;
overflow: hidden;
"><span>{{#if: {{{Link|}}} | [[{{{Link}}}|{{{Box Title}}}]] | {{{Box Title}}} }}</span><!--If 7th parameter exists, make the title a link.-->{{#if:{{{collapse|}}}|<span style="font-size: 1rem; float: right">[<span style="color: #4d97ff" class="mw-customtoggle-{{{collapseid}}}">show/hide</span>]</span>}}
</div><div {{#if:{{{collapse|}}}|id="mw-customcollapsible-{{{collapseid}}}" class|class}}="{{#if:{{{collapse|}}}|box-content {{{collapse}}} mw-collapsible|box-content}}" style="
padding: 5px;
display: block;
clear: both;
background-color: #fff;
font-size: 13px;
"><!--
-->{{{Page To Show}}}
</div></div>
